alert.note: Alert for Bland; Giles; Pulaski; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pulaski, southwestern Giles, eastern Bland and north central Wythe Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Spur, or near Max Meadows, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wytheville... Bland... Max Meadows... Long Spur... Mechanicsburg... White Gate... and Kimberling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
